error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The percentage of graphic novels should be 15, not 18, so the percentage of comic books will be 100-65-15=20.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 17
The proportion of graphic novels is .15 because 18 / 120 = <<18/120=0.15>>0.15
The percentage of graphic novels is 15 because 100 x 0.15 = <<100*0.15=15>>15
The percentage of comic books is 20 because 100 - 65 - 18 = <<100-65-18=17>>17
